entry.title: Use the Windows keyboard driver to remap and disable keys
entry.content: I've created a wiki page describing how you can use the keyboard mapper function in the Windows keyboard driver. It enables you to globally remap keys in Windows, or simply disable them, and it does not require KillKeys or any other additional program. This is useful if KillKeys is not working in your game (e.g. Diablo II).

entry.title: Turn your caps lock key into a search key
entry.content: I just read a tutorial on Lifehacker on how to turn your caps lock key into a search key. It's a pretty nice tweak since the caps lock key doesn't serve much purpose these days.

entry.title: How to compile my programs
entry.content:
I have made a video explaining how to compile SuperF4, which is another program of mine. The instructions also work just as well with KillKeys. This might be of interest if you are learning programming and want to make your own modifications to KillKeys. Go to the Build wiki page to see it.

Visit the website
Watch the video on YouTube
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)
Visit the author's website

entry.title: KillKeys - 1.2
entry.content:
Released 1.2.

This release fixes a couple of minor bugs. The new version is also available in 64-bit. The installer will automatically install the correct executable. For more details, see the changelog below.

Changelog:

  • Added 64-bit executable. The installer will automatically install the correct executable.
  • Fixed an issue in Windows 7 where the desktop would be treated as a fullscreen window.
  • Fixed some minor bugs.

Visit the website

Download installer - Archive: English (x64) - Spanish (x64) - Galician (x64)

Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

Visit the author's website

entry.title: KillKeys - 1.1
entry.content:
Released 1.1.
This release fixes a crash that prevented the use of both Keys and Keys_Fullscreen at the same time. It also fixes many small bugs. No major feature added. New language: Galician by Alexander De Sousa.

Changelog:
  • Fixed crash when using both Keys and Keys_Fullscreen.
  • Language can now be changed in KillKeys.ini.
  • A lot of small bug fixes.
Visit the website
Download installer - Archive: English - Spanish - Galician
Discuss in the forum (no registration required)

entry.title: KillKeys - 1.0
entry.content:
Released 1.0.
Bumping the version to 1.0 since I think KillKeys now accomplishes what I set out for it to do. KillKeys is now available in Spanish thanks to Fabrizio Ferri.
I have also opened a forum which I hope you'll use to discuss KillKeys and my other tools, let me know what's good and what's bad.
I have also gotten some reports that my tools show up on some antivirus scanners, these are all false positives! I will try to report it to the antivirus vendors.
Finally, I would like to let you know that I have put donating details on the site, so if you feel this program is useful, please consider donating money.
